Name: Block-SmbShareAccess
Synopsis: Adds a deny ACE for a trustee to the security descriptor of the SMB share.

Name: Close-SmbOpenFile
Synopsis: Closes a file that is open by one of the clients of the SMB server.

Name: Close-SmbSession
Synopsis: Ends forcibly the SMB session.

Name: Disable-SmbDelegation
Synopsis: Disables a constrained delegation authorization for an SMB client and server.

Name: Enable-SmbDelegation
Synopsis: Enables a constrained delegation authorization for an SMB client and server.

Name: Get-SmbBandWidthLimit
Synopsis: Gets the list of SMB bandwidth caps for each traffic category.

Name: Get-SmbClientConfiguration
Synopsis: Retrieves the SMB client configuration.

Name: Get-SmbClientNetworkInterface
Synopsis: Retrieves the network interfaces used by the SMB client.

Name: Get-SmbConnection
Synopsis: Retrieves the connections established from the SMB client to the SMB servers.

Name: Get-SmbDelegation
Synopsis: Gets the constrained delegation authorizations for an SMB client.

Name: Get-SmbGlobalMapping
Synopsis: Get-SmbGlobalMapping [[-LocalPath] <string[]>] [[-RemotePath] <string[]>] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Get-SmbMapping
Synopsis: Retrieves the SMB client directory mappings created for a server.

Name: Get-SmbMultichannelConnection
Synopsis: Retrieves the SMB connections made between the SMB client network interfaces and the SMB server network interfaces.

Name: Get-SmbMultichannelConstraint
Synopsis: Retrieves the constraints that define how the SMB client uses network interfaces to connect to the servers.

Name: Get-SmbOpenFile
Synopsis: Retrieves basic information about the files that are open on behalf of the clients of the SMB server.

Name: Get-SmbServerCertificateMapping
Synopsis: Get-SmbServerCertificateMapping [[-Name] <string[]>] [[-Subject] <string[]>] [-Thumbprint <string[]>] [-DisplayName <string[]>] [-Type <Type[]>] [-IncludeHidden] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Get-SmbServerConfiguration
Synopsis: Retrieves the SMB server configuration.

Name: Get-SmbServerNetworkInterface
Synopsis: Retrieves the network interfaces used by the SMB server.

Name: Get-SmbSession
Synopsis: Retrieves information about the SMB sessions that are currently established between the SMB server and the associated clients.

Name: Get-SmbShare
Synopsis: Retrieves the SMB shares on the computer.

Name: Get-SmbShareAccess
Synopsis: Retrieves the ACL of the SMB share.

Name: Grant-SmbShareAccess
Synopsis: Adds an allow ACE for a trustee to the security descriptor of the SMB share.

Name: New-SmbGlobalMapping
Synopsis: New-SmbGlobalMapping [[-LocalPath] <string>] [-RemotePath] <string> -Credential <pscredential> [-Persistent <bool>] [-RequireIntegrity <bool>] [-RequirePrivacy <bool>] [-UseWriteThrough <bool>] [-FullAccess <string[]>] [-DenyAccess <string[]>] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: New-SmbMapping
Synopsis: Creates an SMB mapping.

Name: New-SmbMultichannelConstraint
Synopsis: Creates an SMB multi-channel constraint for the specified server.

Name: New-SmbServerCertificateMapping
Synopsis: New-SmbServerCertificateMapping [-Name] <string> [-Thumbprint] <string> [-Subject <string>] [-DisplayName <string>] [-Type <Type>] [-Force] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: New-SmbShare
Synopsis: Creates an SMB share.

Name: Remove-SmbBandwidthLimit
Synopsis: Removes SMB bandwidth caps.

Name: Remove-SMBComponent
Synopsis: Remove-SmbComponent [-Name] <string[]> [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Remove-SmbGlobalMapping
Synopsis:
Remove-SmbGlobalMapping [[-LocalPath] <string[]>] [[-RemotePath] <string[]>] [-Force] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-PassThru] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Remove-SmbGlobalMapping -InputObject <CimInstance#MSFT_SmbGlobalMapping[]> [-Force] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-PassThru] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Remove-SmbMapping
Synopsis: Removes the SMB mapping to an SMB share.

Name: Remove-SmbMultichannelConstraint
Synopsis: Removes SMB multi-channel constraints.

Name: Remove-SmbServerCertificateMapping
Synopsis:
Remove-SmbServerCertificateMapping [-Name] <string[]> [[-Subject] <string[]>] [[-Thumbprint] <string[]>] [[-DisplayName] <string[]>] [[-Type] <Type[]>] [-IncludeHidden] [-Force] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-PassThru] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Remove-SmbServerCertificateMapping -InputObject <CimInstance#MSFT_SmbServerCertificateMapping[]> [-Force] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-PassThru] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Remove-SmbShare
Synopsis: Deletes the specified SMB shares.

Name: Revoke-SmbShareAccess
Synopsis: Removes all of the allow ACEs for a trustee from the security descriptor of the SMB share.

Name: Set-SmbBandwidthLimit
Synopsis: Adds an SMB bandwidth cap.

Name: Set-SmbClientConfiguration
Synopsis: Sets the SMB client configuration.

Name: Set-SmbPathAcl
Synopsis: Sets the ACL for the file system folder to match the ACL used by an SMB share.

Name: Set-SmbServerConfiguration
Synopsis: Sets the SMB Service configuration.

Name: Set-SmbShare
Synopsis: Modifies the properties of the SMB share.

Name: Unblock-SmbShareAccess
Synopsis: Removes all of the deny ACEs for the trustee from the security descriptor of the SMB share.

Name: Update-SmbMultichannelConnection
Synopsis: Forces the SMB client to update the multi-channel-related information.
